description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Platforming finesse required! Master the expanded colour switching mechanic (IKARUGA) to smash, race and maneuver your way through challenging levels. Iota features a groovy custom soundtrack and all original art.
description.short: Platforming finesse required! Master the expanded colour switching mechanic (IKARUGA) to smash, race and maneuver your way through challenging levels. Iota features a groovy custom soundtrack and all original art.
